<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scintillating Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1829) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 141 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wellspring Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=104) (Level 16)

</column>

---

Your spells become a radiant display of light and color. If your next action is to Cast a Spell that doesn't have the [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) trait, has no duration, and requires creatures to attempt a Reflex save, the spell explodes in a spray of scintillating lights, in addition to its other effects. Each creature that failed its Reflex save against the spell is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round, and those who critically failed are instead [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 round.
name: Scintillating Spell
